top_tweets.text: You know we got to finish the menu with something sweet for the @bts_bighit event at @AllegiantStadm ! Presenting Green Tea Infused Soft Chocolate, Coconut Tapioca & Dragon 🐉 Fruit. Next time I'm doing a purple dessert for the #BTSARMY  💜 🙏 #bts https://t.co/7gpC3irMNE
75 years old legend gail falkenberg keeps tennis alive https://t.co/lBfqi5Sm8c

I’m here with a new friend…an amazing beekeeper near Chernihiv north of Kyiv! He lost 80 percent of his hives…his house & car shelled by bombs, but he still donates the honey to hospital, shelters…anyone who needs. @WCKitchen is going to help him rebuild! #ChefsForUkraine 🇺🇦 https://t.co/qzNATvxz2j
💥 "I’m getting calls from these really large institutions that are building small buckets of #bitcoin." - Billionaire Orlando Bravo 👀
